articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Apple latest major company to shun Russia - Reuters.com
articles.description: Apple joined Google, Ford, Harley-Davidson and other major companies on Tuesday who stopped sales and distanced themselves from Russia because of the invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:
Posted
